# Are you ready to become the ultimate Spirit Guardian?
Welcome, Spirit Guardian, to the immersive strategy and hilarious atmosphere of **Encircled**, a VR-exclusive tower defense game.

Designed from the ground up to bring the best of tower defense and VR together, **Encircled** combines strategic depth with endless replayability and a whimsical sense of humor.

Freely place your towers anywhere on the map to create the ultimate defense, considering the Elemental Type advantages and disadvantages to outsmart your foes. When your towers can't hold the line, take matters into your own handsâ€”literally! Channel powerful beams from your hands to decimate enemies and turn the tide of battle.

With various game modes, unique levels, and a wide array of towers and enemies, each time you play offers a new challenge and fresh excitement. Perfect for both VR newcomers and those with rock-solid VR legs, **Encircled** delivers a rewarding strategic experience that will keep you coming back for more.
# Key Features
**Gameplay**
- **19 enemies**, each with one of **7 Element Types**
- **11 Towers**, each with one of **7 Damage Types and branching upgrades**
- **36 levels** to clear
- **9 hand-crafted maps** that are deeply varied, with more planned in future updates!
- **4 game modes** for each map: **Standard, Hard, Endless, and Spirit Master**
- **Master the Elements** as you learn the Type Advantages for each Element and Damage Type

**Comfort**

- Comfortably play seated or standing
- Optional smooth/snap turning, vignette, smooth movement/teleportation
